Documentation.UserDocu: This object allows to computation of the along wind spectrum using the von Karman Spectrum with flexibility of parameter choice

computeGeneralizedVonKarmanWindAutoSpectrum(frequency,integralLengthScale,meanSpeed,standardDeviation,a = 4.0,b = 0.0,c = 1.0,d = 1.0,e = 1.0,f = 1.0,g = 1.0,h = 70.8,i = 2.0,j = 5.0/6.0); frequency = the frequency value for which the spectrum will be calculated integralLengthScale = the integral length scale meanSpeed = the mean wind speed at the height standardDeviation = the standard deviation a, b, c, d, e, f, g, h, i, j = some constant parameters
